attributes.review: Never would I ever think that Chester cheetah could amount to such unlawful behavior to produce a talking Cheeto that violates the human rights of Americans. Would never open.

attributes.review: this app is one of the absolute worst apps i’ve ever seen in my entire life. not only is trump a racist and sexist homophobic and a rapist he is our president and with that means no ew yuck gross no no very bad. this deserves 1 star rating wand should be taken down immediately

attributes.review: This toupee wearing, potato smelling, rancid man made even my dead grandma in the grave cry. I can hear her ashes move this very second in fact

I DO NOT SUPPORT cannibalism! 😡 AFTER I witnessed that, it started RAINING CHEETOS IN MY TOWN! I AM ALLERGIC TO CHEETOS. therefore, this app makes me both physically and mentally ill 😷
